Package adrenaline.network.socket.client

Class SocketClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • adrenaline.network.socket.client.SocketClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClientInterface, java.lang.Runnable
    public class SocketClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClientInterface, java.lang.Runnable
    Class used to connect a generic client to the server after choosing the socket option.
